definitions.definition: Of the sky , weather , etc.: the state of being cloudy .
examples: Expect considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers.

definitions.definition: Of a liquid : the property of being murky .
examples: Cloudiness in the water is most often caused in new aquariums by white bacteria.

definitions.definition: Of information , a writing style , etc.: the property of being obscure .

main_definition: Of the sky , weather , etc.: the state of being cloudy .
secondary_definitions: Of a liquid : the property of being murky .
( figurative ) Of information , a writing style , etc.: the property of being obscure .
